contents.text: Thank you for calling Red Oak Technologies, South Bay’s premier recruiting agency serving companies from startups to Fortune 500s.
If you are a job seeker looking for new career opportunities, press 1.
To speak directly with a recruiter about current openings, press 1.
All of our recruiters are currently assisting other candidates. Please hold and we will connect you as soon as possible.

navigationGoals: Connect me with a recruiter to discuss current job openings.
I need to speak with a recruiter about current job openings that match my military experience.
I want to sync with a recruiter to explore active software engineering openings.
I need someone to help me talk to a recruiter about current job openings.
I’d like to speak with a recruiter about current physics research internships in Silicon Valley startups.

contents.text: To submit your resume and portfolio for consideration, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our resume intake team. One of our specialists will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Submit my resume and portfolio for consideration.
I want to submit my resume and portfolio for consideration for veteran-focused roles.
I need to provision my resume and GitHub portfolio for evaluation.
I want to send in my resume and portfolio for job consideration.
I want to submit my CV and sample research projects for consideration for theoretical physics positions.

contents.text: If you are an employer seeking expert staffing solutions, press 2.
To speak with a client services representative about your hiring needs, press 1.
All of our client advisors are currently busy. Please hold and the next available representative will assist you shortly.

navigationGoals: Speak with a client services representative about our company’s hiring needs.
I’m a veteran-owned business owner and would like to discuss my hiring needs with a staffing specialist.
I’m an employer seeking to engage a client services specialist to scope our staffing requirements.
I need to speak with a staffing consultant about hiring for my company.
I need to discuss staffing a research assistant in experimental physics for my university lab.

contents.text: For details on our customized recruiting solutions and service packages, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve information on our services. A solutions specialist will be with you momentarily.

navigationGoals: Get details on your customized recruiting solutions and service packages.
I need details on your customized recruiting solutions and service packages for my veteran-led company.
I’d like to retrieve detailed specs on your modular recruiting solutions and service-tier offerings.
I want information on your recruiting services and packages.
I’d like details on your customized recruiting packages for hiring specialized physicists for a new lab project.
